post.body: Hi jedismurf, still saying wrong combination of email, handle and password, so wont let me log on. Hmmm.
Ponygurl, can u forward me the web address 4 twitters? Or anyone else?
Nite ponygurl
Well, had a long day, catch all tomorrow, take care honeypooh, hope ur toe feels better. Nite,nite.
Yeah, l knw what u mean, they dont look dangerous to me, and most would rather run frm u unless u mess with there cubs.
Actually Pa have too many rite now, game warden recommendind a a 3day hunting season to slim down population.
Lmbo, am country, just not sure wat country ur talkin bout.
Am being serious, have seen bears down by the tracks less then mile frm my house! Was told2 steer clear, very dangerous.
Yeah, ya dont even see gators cuddling each other.
Would rather see poohbears down by my train tracks stead of plain black or brown bears.
Yawns, slides next to honeypooh, awww, poohbears are kinda cute.
Darn, l was hopping 4 a more filling meal! Lol
What u hopeing to catch with that? Minnows?
Look l see an inchworm!
Lol poohbear said woody! Lmbo
No, but they poo like bears, lol
Or bearly human! Lmao, l so funny, l kills myself!
So she a bare bear?
Who told u that? See lots of bear here in mountians of Pa, saw momma and babys less then mile frm my um swap!
Ok, l wont eat ur wildchild. Monster safe frm me.
